byline.original: By JAMES B. RESTON Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Brit planes bomb German air bases at Oslo, Stavanger and Aalborg
snippet: LONDON, May 1--Flying in relays through heavy anti-aircraft fire and converging on their targets from all directions, one of the largest British bombing formations of the war last night and today battered the German air bases at Oslo and Stavanger...

headline.main: 75 BRITISH PLANES BOMB NAZI FIELDS; Oslo, Stavanger and Aalborg Raided--London Admits the Loss of Seven Craft

lead_paragraph: LONDON, May 1--Flying in relays through heavy anti-aircraft fire and converging on their targets from all directions, one of the largest British bombing formations of the war last night and today battered the German air bases at Oslo and Stavanger in Norway and at Aalborg in Denmark.
